channel.title: Blogs for Bootstrappers
channel.description:
I've been working on a list of blogs that are of interest to bootstrappers, and published it this week here:
https://ryanbattles.com/post/blogs-for-bootstrappers
However, I'd like to make this an even more killer list, and I'm fully prepared to add more to it. I was wondering if you have any other recommendations that I haven't included there as recommended blogs. Thanks!

item.title: Blogs for Bootstrappers
item.dc:creator: itengelhardt
item.description:
Hi Ryan,

may I be so bold and suggest my own blog for your list?

Stuff I do on my blog:

  • Notes from MicroConf Europe and previous conferences (also see: Notes from MicroConf Europe 2014)
  • Monthly income reports

Cheers,
Christoph

Read full topic

item.title: Blogs for Bootstrappers
item.dc:creator: jnye131
item.description:
you might want to make this into a OPML file so people can easily subscribe to all of the RSS feeds.

Read full topic

item.title: Blogs for Bootstrappers
item.dc:creator: JustinMcGill
item.description:
Thanks @ryanbattles - I appreciate the feedback!

Read full topic

item.title: Blogs for Bootstrappers
item.dc:creator: ryanbattles
item.description:
Hey @JustinMcGill. Thanks for the link to your blog. You’ve got some great stuff on there, I especially like your transparency with launching your product. Just signed up for the email updates!

Read full topic

item.title: Blogs for Bootstrappers
item.dc:creator: JustinMcGill
item.description:
Hey @ryanbattles - I found a few new one’s in your list that I liked so thanks for compiling. I’m a subscriber to your blog myself! I’d love to hear your feedback on my bootstrapped blog - http://justinmcgill.net.

Read full topic
